title: Cat. 77.1  Manao tupapau (She Thinks of the Ghost or The Ghost Thinks of Her), 1894/95
publication_title: Gauguin Paintings, Sculpture, and Graphic Works at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">Manao tupapau (She Thinks of the Ghost or The Ghost Thinks of Her)  
1894/95  
Wood-block print, printed twice in black ink, on cream Japanese paper; 229 × 157 mm (image); 232 × 188 mm (sheet)  
The Art Institute of Chicago, the Albert H. Wolf Memorial Collection, 1946.435  
Guérin 36, Kornfeld 29 I/IV, a  
For the verso, see fig. 77.1.1

</section><section class="osci-tk-epub-section provenance" id="provenance">William Molard (1862–1936), Paris.

Henri M. Petiet (1894–1980), Paris, by 1938.

Sold by Jean Andre Goriany (born 1893), New York and Lima, to the Art Institute of Chicago, 1946.

</section><section class="osci-tk-epub-section exhibitions" id="exhibitions">Brooklyn Museum, Complete Graphic Works and Some Paintings by Gauguin, June 18–Sept. 18, 1938, no cat.

</section><section class="osci-tk-epub-section references" id="references">Elizabeth Mongan, Eberhard W. Kornfeld, and Harold Joachim, Paul Gauguin: Catalogue Raisonnéof His Prints, with assistance of Christine E. Stauffer (Galerie Kornfeld, 1988), p. 134, no. 29.

</section><section epub:type="footnotes" id="footnotes">Elizabeth Mongan, Eberhard W. Kornfeld, and Harold Joachim, Paul Gauguin: Catalogue Raisonné of His Prints, with assistance of Christine H. Stauffer (Galerie Kornfeld, 1988), p. 134, no. 29.

According to exhibition checklist compiled by Carl O. Schniewind for Brooklyn Museum’s, Complete Graphic Works and Some Paintings by Gauguin, June 18–Sept. 18, 1938, on file in the Brooklyn Museum Archives, photocopy in curatorial object file, Department of Prints and Drawings, Art Institute of Chicago.

According to exhibition checklist compiled by Carl O. Schniewind for Brooklyn Museum’s, Complete Graphic Works and Some Paintings by Gauguin, June 18–Sept. 18, 1938, on file in the Brooklyn Museum Archives, photocopy in curatorial object file, Department of Prints and Drawings, Art Institute of Chicago.

</section><section id="figures">Cat. 77.1 Manao tupapau (She Thinks of the Ghost or The Ghost Thinks of Her, 1894/95.

fig. 77.1.1 Verso of Gauguin’s Manao tupapau (She Thinks of the Ghost or The Ghost Thinks of Her) (1894/95). The Art Institute of Chicago, 1946.435.

</section>
